me.lihq.game.screen.elements.journal

Class Journal

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lihq.game.screen.elements.journal.Journal

  • public class Journal
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates the base Journal components including the background image, and left hand menu. Also allows the selection of Clues, Speech or Notepad for display and renders these objects.
    Author:
    jacobwunwin
